known_issues: Data is not being successfully logged (user reported ongoing logging failure).

existing_features.title: Update the frontend HTTP instructions UI to display the new `/status` endpoint URL (built from the resolved backend canister ID), including copy-to-clipboard and open-in-new-tab controls consistent with the existing endpoint rows.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add HTTP GET /status endpoint that returns the canister status

Implement the Internet Computer HTTP interface on the backend canister by exporting a public query `http_request` function that can be called via `https://<CANISTER_ID>.raw.icp0.io/...`, and route requests by URL path.

Add an HTTP GET endpoint `GET /status` that returns a JSON object describing canister status (health) sufficient to debug whether logging is working (e.g., includes current time and reading counters such as `nextId` and the number of readings stored).
For unsupported paths/methods on the HTTP interface, return a JSON error response with an appropriate HTTP status code (e.g., 404 for unknown path, 405 for unsupported method).

projectName: Add raw.icp0.io HTTP GET /status endpoint for canister health/status
